page.title: 02Spitewinter Camp Site
page.content: Spitewinter Campsite (Grid Ref 342666) lies to the east of the A632 and is 300M above sea level. It consists of several{small camping {areas in 4 acres}of woodland. The camp site is used by the{Scout {and Guide}movement and other Youth Groups. Accommodation is provided in permanent{wooden huts.}The Les Burt Hut and Lair both measure 40ft x 20ft, with a cold water supply, fridge, and chairs and tables. The Lair also has boilers, and an oven. Cooking equipment is not provided, but all huts are supplied with electricity. Mayor's Parlour, Donkin Hut and Crew Hut cater for smaller groups and Venture units.
